text: “(Kumbukirani) pamene Allah adati: “Iwe Isa (Yesu)! Ine ndikukwaniritsira nyengo yako yokhala ndi moyo (Ayuda sachita kanthu kwa iwe). Ndipo ndikunyamulira kwa Ine ndiponso ndikuyeretsa kwa anthu osakhulupirira (omwe ndi adani ako). Ndipo amene akutsata (iwe) ndiwasankha kukhala apamwamba pa amene sadakhulupirire kufikira tsiku lachimaliziro. Kenako kobwerera kwanu nkwa Ine, ndipo ndidzaweruza pakati panu pa zomwe mudali kusiyana
